alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 11 at 1:53AM PDT until July 16 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 105 possible, with temperatures peaking Friday through Sunday. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
